text: Hamile niscayarupale bani isra'ilabata vaca li'aum ra tiniharutarpha paigambaraharu pani pathayaum (tara) jaba kunai paigambara uniharusam'ma yasto kura (allahako adesa) li'era a'umdathyo juna uni manale ruca'umnnathe ta uniharule (paigambaraharuko) eka samuhala'i jhutha bhanihale ra arko samuhala'i hatya garidi'e
